attributes.additional_details: We want to make a change within the world! We believe that every child has the right to attend school and achieve the best that they can, but Child Labour is robbing them of a positive future. We want to make a difference by offering alternatives to child labour. We need to raise awareness of the problems that child labour holds and change it for future generations! For that we need your help! With your support we can make a difference and change the laws for child labour!
